name: Main Apps Trust S.L.
description:
We are a young company based in the 22@ district of Poblenou, Barcelona. Our main area of expertise is the development of video games and applications for mobile devices. We have a small but highly efficient team of professionals specializing in design and programming for iPhone and Android devices.

Our mission is to create innovative apps and games that address needs not currently covered by the market. To achieve this, we maintain a constant focus on the speed of production of our products without compromising quality. We seek perfection in every detail, ensuring that every app and game we develop meets the highest standards.
